attributes.action: allow Northern Rock to have a larger market share.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Northern Rock may now be one of the safest banks, (because it has been nationalised), yet it is only allowed a 1.5% market share. The bank is now actually having to turn down customers wanting to invest. I think that this is wrong and shouldn't be allowed, other banks have no caps, (I think), or if they do, their limits far exceed 1.5% of the market.


Honestly I dont know that much about banks but im pretty sure im right, if not, sorry.
